name: Rat Moon Colony Drill Taxi Simulator 2022
name_original: Rat Moon Colony Drill Taxi Simulator 2022
description:
Rat Moon Colony Drill Taxi Simulator 2022

This is our submission for the 2022 Lost Relic Games - Game Jam. This year we were able to trick a third person to join our team.

Goal: Do your best to make rat money by taking rat members of the Rat colony to their rat destinations, beat the rat clock, and watch out for the rat obstacles!  Hint: Take a rat taxi job by rat navigating to one of the rat customers, then rat follow the green rat arrow to their desired rat destination.

Controls: WAD, space bar or Left/Up/Right Arrow Keys, space bar.

w or Up arrow - moves you rat forward

a or Left arrow - moves you rat left

d or Right arrow - moves you rat right

space bar - rat boost!

Backstory: In an attempt to populate the moon as a launch site for deep space missions, Earth's space programs began sending rats to the moon prior to sending humans. Unexpectedly, rats began developing their own rat civilization on the rat moon resulting in an infestation of a rat colony. Due to the limited amount of rat resources on the rat moon, the RATstronauts have only a single rat auger-taxi to get from one rat location to another.

Developed for:
